mapper.select: SELECT SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdClaId ,SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdClaName FROM PD_SFT_STD_ITEM WHERE LEVEL_ID = '1' ORDER BY SFT_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM PD_STANDARD WHERE CLASSESTREE_CODE = CONCAT(#{classesCode},#{machiningCode},#{breedCode})

SELECT A.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdSubId ,A.SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdSubName ,B.SFT_GOOD_VAL AS sftStdExcVal ,B.SFT_OK_VAL AS sftStdSuitVal ,B.SFT_NG_VAL AS sftStdUnqualVal FROM PD_SFT_STD_ITEM AS A LEFT JOIN PD_SFT_STD AS B ON A.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID = B.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AND B.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} WHERE A.PARENT_ID = #{filterMap.sftStdItemId}
